benchmark_details.name: EPICACHE (Episodic Key-Value Cache Management for Long Conversational Question Answering)
benchmark_details.overview: EPICACHE is a training-free Key-Value (KV) cache management framework designed for long conversational question answering under fixed memory budgets. It employs block-wise prefill and episodic KV compression to manage memory efficiently while preserving response accuracy.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable efficient long conversational question answering under strict memory constraints while improving accuracy through effective cache management.

data.source: LongConvQA benchmarks including Realtalk, LoCoMo, and LongMemEval.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the model's performance on various QA tasks across different cache sizes.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in answering questions accurately based on long contextual information.
methodology.baseline_results: EPICACHE outperforms existing methods by 20% in accuracy under compressed memory budgets.
methodology.validation: Validated against multiple conversation history benchmarks.
